alert.note: Alert for Ashley; Chicot (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 14 at 7:44PM CDT until June 14 at 8:45PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: The National Weather Service in Jackson has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Chicot County in southeastern Arkansas... Northeastern Ashley County in southeastern Arkansas... Southwestern Sunflower County in northwestern Mississippi... Washington County in northwestern Mississippi... Northwestern Humphreys County in central Mississippi... * Until 845 PM CDT. * At 744 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 7 miles west of Mcmillan Corner, or 9 miles south of Dermott, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Lake Village and Mcmillan Corner around 755 PM CDT. Greenville and Wayside around 810 PM CDT. Metcalfe around 815 PM CDT. Leland and Arcola around 820 PM CDT. Tribbett around 825 PM CDT. Holly Ridge and Darlove around 830 PM CDT. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
